scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting backend in PRODUCTION mode' && npm run build && node server.js
scripts.dev: echo '🔧 Running backend in DEVELOPMENT mode' && cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --mode development
scripts.stage: echo '🛠️ Running backend in STAGING mode' && cross-env NODE_ENV=staging webpack --mode production
scripts.build: echo '📦 Building backend assets' && webpack --mode production
